aswanna adawiyedi ma adahas kale, sahithyaya wishayaya pasalen iwathata wisiwima, (aththatama wune, amana deshapalu thindu nisa, sahithyaya kannada kiya asu deshapalana ambaruwan wisin, sahithyaya wishayaya pasalen iwathata wisi kirimayi) awasanawantha thathwayak bawath, ee nisama yantham kawi, ketikatha, githa kipayak pamanak ugath daruwan ‘mama sahithyaya ugathekmi’ kiyana anuwana sankalpaya grahanaya kara ganimathya.

ohu athulu thraswadi kriya kala koti sanwidhanaya sampurnayenma winasha karanu labina.eekabaddha yanthranaya gena mahinda rajapaksha mahatha ge nayakathwaya yatathema me thinduwa ganu labu bawada sihipath kala yuthuya.eda demala bedumwadayata erehiwa parlimenthuwe menma pitathath itha gambauru deshana pawathwu pujya athuraliye rathana himiyan koti sanwidhanaya samaga giwisam gasu ema sthawaraya kawadath wenas nokala wathman agamathiwaraya itha honda mahathmayek yayi piligena ohuge pakshayen parlimenthuwe wada siti.meya daiwaye saradamakda. 2005 wasare menma wathman rajayada rata bedime nyaya pathraya sarthaka kara ganimata keti parawal soyamin siti.eyin eelama namathi awajathaka daruweku bihikarannata wililana athara warin wara siseriyan sathkam karannatada uthsaha darayi.wathman kathanayaka waraya pasugiya da ranga dakwuye me siseriyan natakayata perahuruwakda.sabawinma demala eelam mathawadayata bedmwadayatada nandikadal kalapuwe dun wisanduma menma thinduwak dima dan athyawashya weyi.ee thinduwa libaral matha darana sinhala bedumwadintada adala weyi.
